snippet: Anna Netrebko pulls out of a high-profile run of "Don Giovanni" to spend time with her 3-year-old son.
abstract: Anna Netrebko pulls out of a high-profile run of "Don Giovanni" to spend time with her 3-year-old son.

headline.main: Netrebko Withdraws From 'Don Giovanni' in Berlin, Citing Another Role: Mother
headline.print_headline: For Netrebko, Her Son Trumps ‘Don Giovanni’
